授業方法: Depending on the circumstances surrounding the ongoing pandemic, the instructor may conduct sessions in person on campus, or may instead conduct lectures online on Zoom. Information about which lectures will be in person and which will be online will be announced in the first week of April before the first day of class and posted on this course's LUNA page as an announcement (and on this syllabus page). Please note that all assignments will be on LUNA, and important announcements about the course will be posted regularly on LUNA throughout the term. It is therefore critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.
